history.narrative: Law 8-154, the “Recycling Clarification Amendment Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-408, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 15, 1990, and May 29, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 14, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-215 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
